amendment.description: An amendment to strike section 501 and insert that no Federally-mandated steps should be taken to mitigate global climate change if those steps would harm American consumers, workers, or businesses in any way.

action.text: Mr. Dicks raised a point of order against the Sullivan amendment (A021). Mr. Dicks stated that the amendment by Mr. Sullivan seeks to change existing law and constitutes legislation in an appropriation bill. The Chair sustained the point of order.
